name: Anamitra

projects.title: Github Repository Creator
projects.description: This application enables users to log in using their GitHub account and effortlessly create a repository accompanied by a sample file. Authentication is achieved through GitHub OAuth, while request authentication utilizes JSON Web Token (JWT). The application requires 'public profile', 'repo', and 'workflow' permissions from the user. User data is stored using PostgresDB/SQLite for efficient data management.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My portfolio website, hosted on a robust platform, showcases my work and expertise. Built with React and Next.js, it features captivating animations using Framer Motion and GSAP. Visitors can explore detailed information about me, including my skills, projects, and achievements, for an engaging and informative experience.

projects.title: Single Image Super Resolution Using GAN
projects.description: Developed cutting-edge Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) model for transforming low-resolution images into high-resolution ones. Our GAN incorporates a powerful custom loss function, resulting in improved realism and convenience compared to previous models like SRResNet and SRCNN. Furthermore, our approach boasts a remarkable 3x faster runtime. In terms of user satisfaction, our GAN achieved an outstanding Mean Opinion Score of 4.11 out of 5, surpassing SRResNet (2.98/5) and SRCNN (2.33/5).

projects.title: Insurance Blockchain
projects.description: Developed a blockchain-based health insurance system using smart contracts to ensure secure and transparent transactions. By implementing insurance policies through minimal proxy, it achieved a remarkable 98% reduction in size and an 85% decrease in deployment costs compared to traditional contract deployment methods. Additionally, developing a payment processor capable of handling payments in ERC20 stablecoins.
